body:
Good Afternoon/Morning/Evening Avicus,
The Cryptographers have put together a website which introduces us, lists projects we have completed, and a submission section to sent in a project request (You may request us to do something for you such as a website or game) We will be as active as possible and hope to help Avicus's community out in any way possible.
The Link to our website:  www.cryptodevelop.net
Also if you wish to apply for the team contact me on Skype (thehoopsman) Or apply on our thread (http://avicus.net/forums/81b88757f)
body_tagged:

replies.body:
Hmm, there are a couple of useless/meaningless text that could be removed.
Even though it may be Wordpress, it's still a cool idea none of the less...

On topic: I don't plan to be involved with any of this, I just thought I would give my opinion on the overall website!
